page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE - GIRL
page.content: I woke at seven, got up, dressed and went downstairs. I warmed the lamb's milk and went to feed him.Afterwards I went to the milking parlour to collect some milk from the tank. Back at the house I made my lunch and breakfast. At eight I left for the bus, travelling ten miles to school. I went through the usual routine of eight lessons and two breaks. At four I returned by bus, then walked two miles home. Arriving, I dressed appropriately and fetched the cows. Later after having tea and doing my homework I played football with my younger brother then put him to bed. After raking the cut lawn, I fed and shut up the chickens, and also the cats and kitten, dog and hamster, then got into bed and read for an hour until ten o'clock.
